headline: Arista Networks Sank Today -- Is It Time to Buy the Stock?
summary: Arista Networks (NYSE: ANET) stock ended Thursday's trading in the red.  The networking technologies company's share price had been up as much as 1.8% early in the day's trading, but it lost ground as the market soured on Nvidia's fourth-quarter earnings report.  Arista stock closed out the day down 5%.

headline: Iron Condor For Arista Networks Stock Has Wide Profit Range
summary: Here's how to set up an iron condor on Arista stock on the premise that it will stay in a range.  As a reminder, an iron condor uses a combination of a bull put spread and a bear call spread.  Since implied volatility is a component of option premium value, higher implied volatility leads to higher premiums.

headline: Meta Platforms Just Caused This Crucial Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stock to Plummet. Should You Buy the Dip?
summary: This is what happened just last week with Meta Platforms (NASDAQ: META) and Arista Networks (NYSE: ANET).  Meta, formerly Arista's biggest customer, pulled back on its spending in 2024.  This news caused investors to sell the stock off hard, and it now sits around 25% below its all-time highs.
